overview:
Rob Banning is the Marketing Director for Innovid â€“ the creator of the iRoll interactive pre-roll ad unit. In this capacity, Rob oversees all global marketing activities, sponsorships, branding, promotions and communications across corporate, sales and product marketing.

Most recently Rob was Director, Global Corporate Marketing at 24/7 Real Media, where he oversaw the day to day operations of the global marketing team. Rob was responsible for the strategic direction, planning and implementation of all marketing efforts ranging from events to advertising campaigns and branding.

Prior to that, Rob was the Manager, Marketing in the broadcast division of Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia. Rob oversaw the daily marketing activities for the 24/7 radio channel on Sirius XM for both the consumer and sales facing sides of the business and worked in tandem with television, print, digital and merchandising sales teams in the development of 360 programs for major brands and advertisers. While at Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia, Rob was assigned numerous projects ranging from the creation, implementation and running of the summer intern project as well as special projects assigned by the CEO.

Prior to the Rob began his career in Los Angeles in traditional broadcast at NBC Universal. In 2007, Rob was reassigned to the New York office as the Manager, Marketing & Special Events.
